usd_publisher_plugin.tests package¶

Submodules¶

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_cache_anim module¶

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_cache_anim.maya_setup()¶

Fixture to set up and tear down the Maya standalone environment.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_cache_anim.test_cache_rig(maya_setup)¶

Test the cache_rig function.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_create_anim_layer module¶

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_create_anim_layer.maya_setup()¶

Fixture to set up and tear down the Maya standalone environment.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_create_anim_layer.test_create_anim_layer(maya_setup)¶

Test the create_anim_layer function.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_load_rig module¶

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_load_rig.maya_setup()¶

Fixture to set up and tear down the Maya standalone environment.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_load_rig.test_load_rig(maya_setup)¶

Test the load_rig function in a real Maya standalone environment.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils module¶

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.maya_setup()¶

Fixture to set up and tear down the Maya standalone environment.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_create_layer()¶

Test the create_layer function for all scenarios: - Valid case: Successfully creates a new USD layer. - Invalid layer directory: Directory does not exist or is not writable. - Invalid stage: Stage is None.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_find_caches()¶

Test the find_caches function for finding cache files in a directory.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_find_rigs()¶

Test the find_rigs function for finding rig Xforms in a USD stage.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_generate_namespace()¶

Test the generate_namespace function for generating a namespace from a path.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_get_framerange(maya_setup)¶

Test the get_framerange function for retrieving start and end frames.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_get_rig_layer()¶

Test the get_rig_layer function for retrieving the rig layer from a USD stage.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_get_scene_proxy()¶

Test the get_scene_proxy function for retrieving the scene proxy shape.

usd_publisher_plugin.tests.test_usd_tool_utils.test_get_stage_path(maya_setup)¶

Test get_stage_path for all scenarios: - Valid proxy shape with a valid file path. - No proxy shapes in the scene. - Multiple proxy shapes in the scene. - Proxy shape with an invalid file path. - Proxy shape with an empty file path.
